page.title: 17POLBATHIC DWELLER'S COMMENTS
page.content: THREE JOURNEYS UNDERTAKEN SINCE 1950 SHOW TRANSPORT PROBLEMS.TO VISIT SEATON, DEVON:"VAN TO ST.GERMANS TO CATCH TRAIN BEFORE 8 A.M.,CROSS NORTH ROAD STATION FROM PLATFORMS 7 TO 1 FOR EXETER TRAIN,ANOTHER TRAIN TO AXMINSTER AND A FOURTH TO SEATON JUNCTION..." TO TEACH AT CAWSAND: "CADGE LIFT (POLBATHIC TO CRAFTHOLE)IN SCHOOL CAR- PROBABLY ILLEGAL.BY SCHOOL DOUBLE-DECKER TO TREGANTLE CORNER WHERE TAXI AWAITED.HOMEWARD BOUND,THE SAME,EXCEPT FOR A RIDE DOWN FROM SCHOOL TO SKINNER'S GARAGE (HOME OF TAXI)BY SCHOOL BUS".BY BUS TO LOOE TODAY: "NORMALLY ONE BUS PER DAY TRAVELS LOOE TO PLYMOUTH VIA POLBATHIC RETURNING TO LOOE MID-AFTERNOON.IN HOLIDAY SEASON 100% INCREASE, TWO BUSES.SO POLBATHIC FOLK MAY TRAVEL TO LOOE IN COMFORT,BUT ONLY ON SATURDAYS. WEEKDAYS BUS RETURNS VIA TRERULEFOOT!"
